Package msnotepad.gui.helper

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AboutDialog
    AboutDialog class help to load the about JDialog from the HTML file.
    FindAndReplaceDialog
    FindAndReplaceDialog class handle both type of dialog, whether it is Find-Dialog or is Replace-Dialog (by making separate inner classes for both the Dialog).
    FindAndReplaceDialog.FindDialog
    FindDialog inner class handle the Finding part of the MSNotepad.
    FindAndReplaceDialog.ReplaceDialog
    ReplaceDialog inner class handle the Replacing part of the Edit menu.
    FontDialog
    FontDialog class handle the font choosing function of the MSNotepad, this Dialog uses the GroupLayout as the LayoutManager.
    OptionPane
    OptionPane class help to make initial OptionPane for the MSNotepad.
    StatusBar
    StatusBar class make basic statusBar for the MSNotepad, with the help of the JPanel.
    StatusBar.StatusBarLabel
    StatusBarLabel inner class help to make label ready for to be added on the statusBar panel.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    DialogType
    DialogType enumeration help to specify the type of dialog according to the app requirement.
